projects.name: Above The Stars
projects.description: Above The Stars was a project created during the Factoria's F5 Hackathon and thought as a future science-fiction marketplace where clients would be able to buy and sell starts and constellations.

projects.name: Cyber To Do List
projects.description: Cyber To Do List is a cyberpunk-themed project where users are able to introduce, read and delete their tasks.

projects.name: Japan Sweets
projects.description: Japan Sweets is a completly functional e-commerce where clients can buy a wide variety of japanese sweets products.

projects.name: Sakura Tarot
projects.description: Sakura Tarot is a simple webpage project in which users are able to play an adivination game where they will get to know their past, present and future.

projects.name: Tenebris Tattoo
projects.description: Tennebris Tattoo Studio was one of my first approaches to programming, it is simply a replica from an official template, an exercise of HTML and CSS.
